vernac_cmds: Require Import Arith Compare_dec Max List Omega.

Inductive cbv : Type := | cbv_constr : list cbv -> term -> value -> cbv | cbv_split : list cbv -> cbv -> term -> value -> cbv | cbv_function : nat -> (variable -> value) -> cbv -> term -> value -> cbv.

Lemma cbv_ind2_gen : forall (P : cbv -> Set)(Q : list cbv -> Set), Q nil -> (forall p lp, P p -> Q lp -> Q (p :: lp)) -> (forall lp t v, Q lp -> P (cbv_constr lp t v)) -> (forall lp p t v, Q lp -> P p -> P (cbv_split lp p t v)) -> (forall n s p t v, P p -> P (cbv_function n s p t v)) -> forall p, P p.
fix H1 8; intros P Q H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 [ lp t v | lp p t v | n s p t v ].
apply H4; revert lp; fix H7 1; intros [ | p lp].
apply H5; revert lp; fix H7 1; intros [ | p' lp].

Lemma cbv_ind2 : forall (P : cbv -> Prop), (forall lp t v, (forall p, In p lp -> P p) -> P (cbv_constr lp t v)) -> (forall lp p t v, (forall p, In p lp -> P p) -> P p -> P (cbv_split lp p t v)) -> (forall n s p t v, P p -> P (cbv_function n s p t v)) -> forall p, P p.
intros P H1 H2 H3 p.
apply cbv_ind2_gen with (Q := fun lp => forall p, In p lp -> P p); simpl; try tauto.

Fixpoint InCBV p proof_tree : Prop := p = proof_tree \/ match proof_tree with | cbv_constr lp _ _ => orl (map (InCBV p) lp) | cbv_split lp p' _ _ => InCBV p p' \/ orl (map (InCBV p) lp) | cbv_function _ _ p' _ _ => InCBV p p' end.
Lemma InCBV_refl p : InCBV p p.
induction p as [lp t v IH_lp | lp p t v IH_lp IH_p | i s p t v IH_p] using cbv_ind2; simpl; tauto.
Lemma InCBV_trans p p' p'': InCBV p p' -> InCBV p' p'' -> InCBV p p''.
induction p'' as [lp t v IH_lp | lp p1 t v IH_lp IH_p' | i s p1 t v IH_p'] using cbv_ind2; intros p p' H1 [H2 | H2]; simpl; subst; trivial.

Lemma cbv_reverse_induction : forall (P : cbv -> Prop) proof_tree, P proof_tree -> (forall lp t v, InCBV (cbv_constr lp t v) proof_tree -> P (cbv_constr lp t v) -> forall p, In p lp -> P p) -> (forall lp p t v, InCBV (cbv_split lp p t v) proof_tree -> P (cbv_split lp p t v) -> forall p', (p' = p \/ In p' lp) -> P p') -> (forall i s p t v, InCBV (cbv_function i s p t v) proof_tree -> P (cbv_function i s p t v) -> P p) -> forall p, InCBV p proof_tree -> P p.
intros P proof_tree H_proof_tree H_constr H_split H_function p H_p.
induction proof_tree as [lp t v IH_lp | lp p' t v IH_lp IH_p' | i s p' t v IH_p'] using cbv_ind2; simpl in H_p.
intros lp' t' v' H3 H4 p'' H5.
apply H_constr with lp' t' v'; trivial.
intros lp' p'' t' v' H3 H4 p''' H5.
apply H_split with lp' p'' t' v'; trivial.
intros i s p'' t' v' H3 H4.
apply H_function with i s t' v'; trivial.
intros lp' t' v' H3 H4 p'' H5.
apply H_constr with lp' t' v'; trivial.
intros lp' p'' t' v' H3 H4 p''' H5.
apply H_split with lp' p'' t' v'; trivial.
intros i s p'' t' v' H3 H4.
apply H_function with i s t' v'; trivial.
intros lp' t' v' H3 H4 p''' H5.
apply H_constr with lp' t' v'; trivial.
intros lp' p''' t' v' H3 H4 p'''' H5.
apply H_split with lp' p''' t' v'; trivial.
intros i s p''' t' v' H3 H4.
apply H_function with i s t' v'; trivial.
intros lp' t' v' H3 H4 p'' H5.
apply H_constr with lp' t' v'; trivial.
intros lp' p'' t' v' H3 H4 p''' H5.
apply H_split with lp' p'' t' v'; trivial.
intros i' s' p'' t' v' H3 H4.
apply H_function with i' s' t' v'; trivial.
Definition rule_subst_of_cbv_function (proof_tree : cbv) : nat * (variable -> value) := match proof_tree with | cbv_function i s _ _ _ => (i, s) | _ => (0, subst_default) end.
Definition proj_left (proof_tree : cbv) : term := match proof_tree with | cbv_constr _ t _ => t | cbv_split _ _ t _ => t | cbv_function _ _ _ t _ => t end.
Definition proj_right (proof_tree : cbv) : value := match proof_tree with | cbv_constr _ _ v => v | cbv_split _ _ _ v => v | cbv_function _ _ _ _ v => v end.

Fixpoint wf (proof_tree : cbv) : Prop := match proof_tree with | cbv_constr l (capply c lt) (c_capply c' lv) => c = c' /\ lt = map proj_left l /\ lv = map proj_right l /\ andl (map wf l) | cbv_split l ((cbv_function _ _ _ (fapply f lv) v) as p) (fapply f' lt) v' => lt = map proj_left l /\ lv = map (@term_from_value _ _ _)(map proj_right l) /\ andl (map wf l) /\ f = f' /\ v = v' /\ wf p | cbv_function i s p (fapply f lv) v => exists lp t, i < length prog /\ nth i prog rule_default = rule_intro f lp t /\ lv = map (@term_from_value _ _ _) (map (psubst s) lp) /\ proj_left p = subst s t /\ proj_right p = v /\ wf p | _ => False end.
Lemma wf_cbv_function i s p t v : wf (cbv_function i s p t v) -> wf p.
Lemma wf_InCBV_wf p proof_tree: wf proof_tree -> InCBV p proof_tree -> wf p.
destruct t; try (intro H_false; destruct H_false).
destruct p'; try (intro H_false; destruct H_false).
destruct t0; try (intro H_false; destruct H_false).
destruct t; try (intro H_false; destruct H_false).
intros i s p' t v _.
destruct t; try (intro H_false; destruct H_false).

Fixpoint size (proof_tree : cbv) : nat := match proof_tree with | cbv_constr l t v => term_size t + value_size v + suml (map size l) | cbv_split l p t v => term_size t + value_size v + size p + suml (map size l) | cbv_function _ _ p t v => size p + term_size t + value_size v end.

Fixpoint max_active_size (proof_tree : cbv) : nat := match proof_tree with | cbv_constr lp _ _ => maxl (map max_active_size lp) | cbv_split lp p _ _ => max (max_active_size p) (maxl (map max_active_size lp)) | cbv_function _ _ p t v => max (term_size t + value_size v) (max_active_size p) end.

Fixpoint max_judgement_size (proof_tree : cbv) : nat := match proof_tree with | cbv_constr lp t v => max (term_size t + value_size v) (maxl (map max_judgement_size lp)) | cbv_split lp p t v => max (term_size t + value_size v) (max (max_judgement_size p) (maxl (map max_judgement_size lp))) | cbv_function _ _ p t v => max (term_size t + value_size v) (max_judgement_size p) end.

Fixpoint sub_trees (proof_tree : cbv) : list cbv := proof_tree :: ( match proof_tree with | cbv_constr lp _ _ => flat_map sub_trees lp | cbv_split lp p _ _ => flat_map sub_trees (p :: lp) | cbv_function _ _ p _ _ => sub_trees p end ).
Lemma sub_trees_neq_nil : forall p, sub_trees p <> [].
Lemma InCBV_In_sub_trees p p' : InCBV p p' <-> In p (sub_trees p').
induction p' as [ lp t v IH_lp | lp p' t v IH_lp IH_p | i s p' t v IH_p ] using cbv_ind2; simpl.
induction p' as [ lp t v IH_lp | lp p' t v IH_lp IH_p | i s p' t v IH_p ] using cbv_ind2; simpl; (intros [H1 | H1]; [left; congruence | right] ).
destruct H1 as [H1 | H1]; [left; tauto | right].

Fixpoint proj_left_max_size_list (default : cbv) (proof_trees : list cbv) : cbv := match proof_trees with | [] => default | [p] => p | p :: ps => let p' := proj_left_max_size_list default ps in if leb (term_size (proj_left p)) (term_size (proj_left p')) then p' else p end.
Lemma In_proj_left_max_size_list p lp : lp <> [] -> In (proj_left_max_size_list p lp) lp.
induction lp as [ | p1 [ | p2 lp] IH]; simpl; try tauto.
match goal with |- context [leb ?x ?y] => case_eq (leb x y); intro H_leb end.
Lemma proj_left_size_le_max_gen default proof_trees proof_tree: In proof_tree proof_trees -> term_size (proj_left proof_tree) <= term_size (proj_left (proj_left_max_size_list default proof_trees)).
induction proof_trees as [ | p1 [ | p2 proof_trees ] IH]; simpl.
match goal with |- context [leb ?x ?y] => case_eq (leb x y); intro H_leb end.
match goal with |- context [leb ?x ?y] => case_eq (leb x y); intro H_leb end.
match goal with |- context [leb ?x ?y] => case_eq (leb x y); intro H_leb end.
Definition proj_left_max_size (proof_tree : cbv) : cbv := proj_left_max_size_list (proof_tree) (sub_trees proof_tree).
Lemma proj_left_size_le_max proof_tree: forall p, InCBV p proof_tree -> term_size (proj_left p) <= term_size (proj_left (proj_left_max_size proof_tree)).
Lemma InCBV_proj_left_max_size p : InCBV (proj_left_max_size p) p.

Fixpoint max_proj_right_size (proof_tree : cbv) : nat := match proof_tree with | cbv_constr lp t v => max (value_size v) (maxl (map max_proj_right_size lp)) | cbv_split lp p t v => max (value_size v) (max (max_proj_right_size p) (maxl (map max_proj_right_size lp))) | cbv_function _ _ p t v => max (value_size v) (max_proj_right_size p) end.
Lemma judgement_size_le_projs_size p : max_judgement_size p <= term_size (proj_left (proj_left_max_size p)) + max_proj_right_size p.
induction p as [ lp t v IH_lp | lp p t v IH_lp IH_p | i s p t v IH_p ] using cbv_ind2; simpl.
destruct (max_dec (term_size t + value_size v) (maxl (map max_judgement_size lp))) as [ H | H ]; rewrite H.
change t with (proj_left (cbv_constr lp t v)) at 1.
destruct (max_dec (term_size t + value_size v) (max (max_judgement_size p) (maxl (map max_judgement_size lp)))) as [ H1 | H1 ]; rewrite H1.
change t with (proj_left ((cbv_split lp p t v))) at 1.
destruct (max_dec (max_judgement_size p) (maxl (map max_judgement_size lp))) as [ H2 | H2 ]; rewrite H2.
destruct (max_dec (term_size t + value_size v) (max_judgement_size p)) as [ H | H ]; rewrite H.
change t with (proj_left ((cbv_function i s p t v))) at 1.

Fixpoint activations (proof_tree : cbv) : list cbv := match proof_tree with | cbv_constr lp _ _ => flat_map activations lp | cbv_split lp p _ _ => activations p ++ flat_map activations lp | cbv_function _ _ p _ _ as p' => p' :: activations p end.
Lemma activation_is_function : forall proof_tree p, In p (activations proof_tree) -> exists i s p' t v, p = cbv_function i s p' t v.
induction proof_tree as [ lp t v IH | lp p' t v IH_lp IH_p' | i s p' t v IH ] using cbv_ind2.
Lemma cbv_function_in_activations_InCBV proof_tree sub_proof_tree i s p t v: sub_proof_tree = cbv_function i s p t v -> InCBV sub_proof_tree proof_tree -> In sub_proof_tree (activations proof_tree).
induction proof_tree as [ lp t' v' IH | lp p' t' v' IH1 IH2 | i' s' p' t' v' IH ] using cbv_ind2; simpl in *.
destruct H1 as [H1 | H1]; try discriminate H1.
destruct H1 as [H1 | [H1 | H1] ]; try discriminate.
Lemma activations_wf : forall proof_tree p, wf proof_tree -> In p (activations proof_tree) -> wf p.
intros proof_tree p H1; revert p; induction proof_tree as [ lp t v IH | lp p' t v IH1 IH2 | i s p' t v IH ] using cbv_ind2; intros p H2; simpl in * |-.
destruct t as [ x | c lt | f lt ]; try tauto.
destruct H1 as (H1 & H3 & H4 & H5).
apply andl_in with (P := wf p') in H5; trivial.
destruct p' as [ lp' t' v' | lp' p' t' v' | i s p' t' v' ]; try tauto.
destruct t' as [ x | c lt | f lt ]; try tauto.
destruct t as [ x | c lt' | f' lt' ]; try tauto.
destruct H1 as (H1 & H3 & H4 & H5 & H6 & H7).
destruct H2 as [ H2 | H2 ]; auto.
apply (andl_in _ _ H4); rewrite in_map_iff; exists p''; tauto.
destruct t as [ x | c lt | f lt ]; try tauto.
destruct H1 as (lp & t & H0 & H1 & H3 & H4 & H5 & H6).
destruct H2 as [ H2 | H2 ]; auto.
destruct p' as [ lp' t' v | lp' p t' v | j s' p t' v ]; firstorder.
Lemma le_max_active_size proof_tree p : In p (activations proof_tree) -> term_size (proj_left p) + value_size (proj_right p) <= max_active_size proof_tree.
induction proof_tree as [ lp t v IH | lp p' t v IH_lp IH_p' | i s p' t v IH ] using cbv_ind2; simpl in *.

Lemma activation_bound_spec : forall proof_tree, wf proof_tree -> forall p, In p (activations proof_tree) -> let (i, s) := rule_subst_of_cbv_function p in term_size (subst s (rhs_of_rule (nth i prog rule_default))) <= activation_bound prog (term_size (proj_left p)).
set (rule_i := nth i prog rule_default); set (l := lhs_of_rule rule_i); set (r := rhs_of_rule rule_i); set (t := proj_left p).
apply maxl_is_max; rewrite map_map, in_map_iff; exists rule_i; split.
generalize (activation_is_function H_p_activation); intros (i' & s' & p' & t' & v & H_p_is_function).
injection H_p_fun; clear H_p_fun; intros; subst i' s'.
destruct H_wf_p as (lp & t' & H); tauto.
generalize (activation_is_function H_p_activation); intros (i' & s' & p' & t' & v & H_p_is_function).
injection H_p_fun; clear H_p_fun; intros; subst i' s'.
destruct H_wf_p as (lp & t' & H); tauto.
assert (subst s l = t) as H_t_matches_lhs.
generalize (activation_is_function H_p_activation); intros (i' & s' & p' & t' & v & H_p_is_function).
injection H_p_fun; clear H_p_fun; intros; subst i' s'.
destruct t' as [ | | f lt]; try tauto.
destruct H_wf_p as (lp & t' & H1 & H2 & H3 & H4 & H5 & H6).
unfold l, r, rule_i in *; clear l r rule_i.
induction lp as [ | p lp IH]; simpl; trivial.

Fixpoint nb_judgements (proof_tree : cbv) : nat := match proof_tree with | cbv_constr lp _ _ => 1 + suml (map nb_judgements lp) | cbv_split lp p _ _ => 1 + nb_judgements p + suml (map nb_judgements lp) | cbv_function _ _ p _ _ => 1 + nb_judgements p end.

Fixpoint nb_judgements_sub_rec (proof_tree : cbv) : nat := match proof_tree with | cbv_constr lp _ _ => 1 + suml (map nb_judgements_sub_rec lp) | cbv_split lp p _ _ => 1 + nb_judgements_sub_rec p + suml (map nb_judgements_sub_rec lp) | cbv_function _ _ _ _ _ => 0 end.
Definition nb_judgements_sub (proof_tree : cbv) : nat := match proof_tree with | cbv_constr _ _ _ => 0 | cbv_split _ _ _ _ => 0 | cbv_function _ _ p _ _ => nb_judgements_sub_rec p end.
Lemma nb_judgements_bound i s p' t v : let p := cbv_function i s p' t v in nb_judgements p <= suml (map nb_judgements_sub (activations p)) + length (activations p).
induction p' as [ lp t' v' IH1 | lp p t' v' IH1 IH2 | i' s' p t' v' IH ] using cbv_ind2; simpl in *.
induction lp as [ | p lp IH2]; trivial.
repeat match goal with |- context [ S (?m + ?n) ] => replace (S (m + n)) with (m + S n) by ring end.
match goal with |- ?m + S ?n <= _ => instantiate (1 := m + n) end.
intros p' Hp'; apply IH1; simpl; tauto.
induction lp as [ | p' lp IH3]; simpl; try omega.
repeat match goal with |- context [ S (?m + (?n + ?p)) ] => replace (S (m + (n + p))) with (n + S (m + p)) by ring end.
match goal with |- ?m + S ?n <= _ => instantiate (1 := m + n) end.
intros p'' Hp''; apply IH1; simpl; tauto.
Lemma nb_judgements_sub_rec_bound p : wf p -> nb_judgements_sub_rec p <= term_size (proj_left p).
induction p as [ lp t v IH | lp p t v IH _ | n s p t v _ ] using cbv_ind2; simpl in *.
destruct t as [ | c lt | ]; try tauto.
destruct H_wf_p as (_ & H_lt & _ & H_wf); clear c'.
destruct p as [ | | i s p t' v']; try tauto.
destruct t' as [ | | f lt]; try tauto.
destruct t as [ | | f' lt']; try tauto.
destruct H_wf_p as (H1 & H2 & H3 & H4 & H5 & lp' & t & H6 & H7 & H8 & H9 & H10 & H11); subst; subst.
Lemma nb_judgements_sub_bound i s p t v : wf (cbv_function i s p t v) -> nb_judgements_sub (cbv_function i s p t v) <= activation_bound prog (term_size t).
assert (In (cbv_function i s p t v) (activations (cbv_function i s p t v))) as H_p_activation.
transitivity (term_size (subst s (rhs_of_rule (nth i prog rule_default)))); [clear H | trivial].
destruct H_wf_p as (lp & t & _ & H_rule & _ & H_proj & _).
Lemma value_size_bounded_by_nb_judgements p : wf p -> value_size (proj_right p) <= nb_judgements p.
induction p as [ lp t v IH | lp p t v _ IH | n s p t v IH ] using cbv_ind2; simpl in *.
destruct t as [ | c lt | ]; try tauto.
destruct H as (H1 & H2 & H3 & H4).
intros p H1; apply IH; trivial.
apply andl_in with (map wf lp); trivial.
destruct p as [ | | n s p t' v']; try tauto.
destruct t' as [ | | f lv]; try tauto.
destruct t as [ | | f' lt]; try tauto.
destruct H as (H1 & H2 & H3 & H4 & H5 & H6).
apply IH in H6; clear IH.
destruct t as [ | | f lv]; try tauto.
destruct H as (lp & t & H1 & H2 & H3 & H4 & H5 & H6).
Lemma term_size_bound_constr lp t v : wf (cbv_constr lp t v) -> andl (map (fun p => term_size t >= term_size (proj_left p)) lp).
destruct t as [ | c lt | ]; try tauto.
destruct H as (H1 & H2 & H3 & H4).
Lemma term_size_bound_split lp p t v : wf (cbv_split lp p t v) -> andl (map (fun p => term_size t >= term_size (proj_left p)) lp).
destruct p as [ | | i s p t' v']; try tauto.
destruct t' as [ | | f lv]; try tauto.
destruct t as [ | | f' lt]; try tauto.
destruct H as (H1 & H2 & H3 & H4 & H5 & H6).
destruct H6 as (lp' & t & H1 & H2 & H4 & H5 & H6 & H7).
Lemma size_bounded_nb_size_judgements p : size p <= nb_judgements p * max_judgement_size p.
induction p as [ lp t v IH_lp | lp p t v IH_lp IH_p | i s p t v IH_p] using cbv_ind2; simpl.
Lemma nb_judgements_sub_bound_gen : forall p p', let S := max_active_size p in wf p -> In p' (activations p) -> nb_judgements_sub p' <= activation_bound prog S.
intros p p' S H_wf_p Hp'.
destruct Hp' as (i' & s' & p'' & t' & v' & Hp').
destruct t' as [ | | f lv]; try omega.
destruct H1 as (lp & t' & H1 & H2 & H3 & H4 & H5 & H6).

Lemma nb_judgements_bound_gen : forall i s p' t v, let p := cbv_function i s p' t v in let A := length (activations p) in let S := max_active_size p in wf p -> nb_judgements p <= A * activation_bound prog S + A.
intros i s p' t v p A S H_wf_p.
set (list_activ := activations (cbv_function i s p' t v)).
destruct H_x as [ p'' [ H_x1 H_x2 ]].

Lemma term_size_proj_left_bound : forall i s p' t v, let p := cbv_function i s p' t v in let S := max_active_size p in wf p -> forall p', InCBV p' p -> term_size (proj_left p') <= activation_bound prog S + S.
intros i s p0 t v p S H_wf_p.
intros lp t' v' H_p'_in_p IH p'' H_p''_in_lp.
destruct t'; try (intro H_false; destruct H_false).
intros lp p' t' v' H_in_p IH p'' H_p''_in.
apply cbv_function_in_activations_InCBV with n v0 p' t0 v1; try auto.
apply InCBV_trans with (cbv_split lp (cbv_function n v0 p' t0 v1) t' v').
destruct t' as [ | | f' lt ]; try tauto.
intros i' s' p' t' v' H_in_p IH.
change t' with (proj_left (cbv_function i' s' p' t' v')).
replace (proj_left p') with (subst s' (rhs_of_rule (nth i' prog rule_default))).
generalize (@activation_bound_spec p H_wf_p (cbv_function i' s' p' t' v')).
apply (@cbv_function_in_activations_InCBV p0 (cbv_function i' s' p' t' v') i' s' p' t' v'); trivial.
transitivity (term_size (proj_left (cbv_function i' s' p' t' v')) + value_size (proj_right (cbv_function i' s' p' t' v'))).
apply cbv_function_in_activations_InCBV with i' s' p' t' v'; trivial.

Lemma size_judgement : forall i s p' t v, let p := cbv_function i s p' t v in let A := length (activations p) in let S := max_active_size p in wf p -> max_judgement_size p <= activation_bound prog S + S + A * activation_bound prog S + A.
intros i s p0 t v p A S H_wf_p.
induction p as [ lp t' v' IH | lp p' t' v' IH_lp IH_p' | i' s' p' t' v' IH ] using cbv_ind2.
destruct (max_dec (value_size v') (maxl (map max_proj_right_size lp))) as [ H_max | H_max ]; rewrite H_max.
change v' with (proj_right (cbv_constr lp t' v')) at 1.
destruct (max_dec (value_size v') (max (max_proj_right_size p') (maxl (map max_proj_right_size lp)))) as [H_max | H_max ]; rewrite H_max; clear H_max.
change v' with (proj_right (cbv_split lp p' t' v')).
destruct (max_dec (max_proj_right_size p') (maxl (map max_proj_right_size lp))) as [ H_max | H_max ]; rewrite H_max; clear H_max.
destruct (max_dec (value_size v') (max_proj_right_size p')) as [H_max | H_max ]; rewrite H_max; clear H_max.
change v' with (proj_right (cbv_function i' s' p' t' v')).

Theorem size_bound : forall i s p' t v, let p := cbv_function i s p' t v in let A := length (activations p) in let S := max_active_size p in wf p -> size p <= (A * activation_bound prog S + A) * (activation_bound prog S + S + A * activation_bound prog S + A).
intros i s p0 t v p A S H_wf_p.

command: fix H1 8; intros P Q H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 [ lp t v | lp p t v | n s p t v ].
apply H4; revert lp; fix H7 1; intros [ | p lp].
apply H5; revert lp; fix H7 1; intros [ | p' lp].
intros P H1 H2 H3 p.
apply cbv_ind2_gen with (Q := fun lp => forall p, In p lp -> P p); simpl; try tauto.
induction p as [lp t v IH_lp | lp p t v IH_lp IH_p | i s p t v IH_p] using cbv_ind2; simpl; tauto.
induction p'' as [lp t v IH_lp | lp p1 t v IH_lp IH_p' | i s p1 t v IH_p'] using cbv_ind2; intros p p' H1 [H2 | H2]; simpl; subst; trivial.
destruct t; try (intro H_false; destruct H_false).
destruct p'; try (intro H_false; destruct H_false).

match goal with |- context [leb ?x ?y] => case_eq (leb x y); intro H_leb end.
